author: perama
content:
A side question in one of the calls this week was around access list utilisation. 

I pulled out all the mainnet transactions of signature type 1, and had a look. Seems to be ~270k transactions total, accounting for ~5% of all potential gas space. This gist has all the transactions as .csv, a notebook with some simple charts (output stripped for size), and some charts as a comment on the gist

https://gist.github.com/perama-v/b9b8c5595f4ce9e3651b816da32d6841

author: perama
content: I also took that sample in the top right of the chart above. It corresponds to a set of transactions with zero gas fee and >100 access list keys.
